full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 645 Filed 03/11/22 Page 8 of 50 8 M38TMAX1
1 Q. On your questionnaire you indicated no as your answer. You checked the box for no. Is no an accurate answer to that question?
2
3 A. No, it is not.
4
5 Q. What is an accurate answer to that question?
6 A. Yes for self.
7 Q. Okay. If you look at question 48A, that question says: If yes, without listing names, please explain.
8
9 And when you filled out the questionnaire on November 4, 2021, you left that blank. What is an accurate answer to question 48A?
10
11 A. I would have put I was abused as a child.
12
13 Q. Without listing names, what happened?
14 A. It was a family member, who is no longer a part of the family, and one of their friends when I was nine and ten years old.
15
16 Q. Did this happen on one occasion or multiple occasions?
17
18 A. Multiple occasions.
19 Q. And did you tell anyone?
20 A. I did not for several years until I was in high school.
21 Q. And when you told someone in high school, did you tell authorities or adults or friends?
22
23 Who did you tell?
24 A. I told my mom and she called the police station and gave a report of the account and but never received any paperwork. So
25
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00010223
